mapper.select: /* intrBoardInqy1021 : 공지사항 상세 */ SELECT B.BRD_ID , B.BRD_TITLE , B.EMP_IDX , E.EMP_NM , E.ORG_CD , O.ORG_NM , E.RANK_CD , R.RANK_NM , B.BRD_CONT , B.READ_HIT , B.REG_DT , B.REG_TM , B.USE_YN , B.DISP_ORDER , B.REMARK FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPINFO E ON B.EMP_IDX = E.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD AND O.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE B.BRD_ID = #{sequenceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: /* intrBoardProc1011 : 공지사항 등록 처리 */ INSERT INTO BOARD ( BRD_ID , EMP_IDX , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONT , READ_HIT , REG_DT , REG_TM , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER , REMARK ) VALUES ( #{sequenceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{brdTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{brdCont, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '0' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DISP_ORDER),0) + 1 FROM BOARD ) , NULL )
